story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1101_0100_20: A few days after the battle...
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Here we go, Champion! You ready?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Yeah! Don’t hold back! Give me everything you’ve
got!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
(When you lose, you feel down in the dumps.
But then there’s nowhere to go but back up!)
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: (You’ve got to think on why it was you lost!)
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: He seems to be overdoing it a bit, doesn’t he?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Indeed. It must be rough for him right now.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
But I’m sure if anyone can break through an
obstacle, it’s Leon!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well done, Champion! You’re pivoting swiftly into
training, leaving no time to feel sorry for yourself.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Er... If I remember, your name was—
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Volo! I’m just a humble merchant!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I had the honor of watching your battle—the one
between the two Charizard!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
A margin of difference decided the winner...
It was really close!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I have a proposal for you, if you’ll hear it.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
How would you feel about you and Charizard
obtaining the power of an arc suit?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
An arc suit... You mean those outfits Lance and the
others revealed during the Arceus Cup?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: How are arc suits different from sygna suits?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
They’re also used to deepen your bond with your
partner, right?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Personally, I believe they’re a blessing from
Arceus!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Now that you mention it, it did seem as if—at that
moment—there was a light inside each of those
sync pairs.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_2900_10:
So...in other words, if Arceus accepts you, you can
transform into an arc suit version of yourself?
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3000_10: Yes! At least, that’s what I presume!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3100_10: And the will of Arceus was...
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Ultimate power, drawn out by deepening the bond
between people and Pokémon...
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3400_10: That might be a good goal for me and Charizard!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3500_10:
I’m glad to hear both you and Charizard are
interested!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3600_10: Seems you’ve found yourself a breakthrough, Leon!
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_3800_10: Y’know, arc suits seem kind of similar to farming.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_4000_10:
You spend a long time carefully helping something
grow until it can be harvested...and it takes a lot
of patience.
story_arceus_02_03000/2401_1001_4200_10: Yes, indeed. That’s a good way to put it!
